document.full_text: saturday brings the start of three weeks of el clasico overload, a series of four matchups between the bitter spanish rivals barcelona and real madrid to decide a season's worth of competitions.
document.title: barcelona-real madrid: rating the coming clasicos
lines_and_colors: saturday brings the start of three weeks of el clasico overload, a series of four matchups between the bitter spanish rivals barcelona and real madrid to decide a season's worth of competitions.
